import React from 'react' export default function Card(props) { let root = document.documentElement let color = "red" root.style.setProperty('--surahname' , color ); // getComputedStyle(root).setProperty('--surahname' , "sfjlkdsfjl") console.log( getComputedStyle(root).getPropertyValue('--surahname')) return (

{props.data.surahAR}سورة

{props.data.surahEN}

) }
